channel.title: How do i make a 317 online (IMPORTANT READ)
channel.description: So im chillen with my mate and i wanna know how to make it online, and i mean the file you edit to 127.0.0.1 or whatever then give him client, i dont know what file im supposed to edit, dont be douchbags either, just awnser the goddamn question please ^_^

item.title: How do i make a 317 online (IMPORTANT READ)
item.dc:creator: @fier12 fier12
item.description:
@fier12 wrote:

Go into no-ip.org or .com

Register

Add host

Make a domain name like --> “newbscape.no-ip.org”

Download DUC

Login into DUC

Manage server on DUC

Check the noip IP that you made

Apply

And you can X that out… Just make sure it is noticeable on your taskbar towards the right

Go into client folder

Open client.java

Do Ctrl+f

Search for 127.0.0.1

Put you no-ip IP into 127.0.0.1

Save+Compile

Download jar maker

Jar the RsPs

Give the jar file out

ENJOY

Ps. If you want to play it change it to 127.0.0.1
Pps. Don’t forget to run the source to start the server

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a 317 online (IMPORTANT READ)

item.source: How do i make a 317 online (IMPORTANT READ)

item.title: How do i make a 317 online (IMPORTANT READ)
item.dc:creator: @noobs1234111 noobs1234111
item.description:
@noobs1234111 wrote:

I’m never cruel to new programmers but the replies your getting are incorrect. In order for you and your friend to both play you need to portforward it. Since it’s just the two of you on I’d put my own ip where you put the localhost (127.0.0.1 / 0.0.0.0) and it shouldn’t be a problem. When you’re ready to actually release it to the public remember to get no-ip and if you can afford it a VPS (myhosting.com is what I use) after you finish changing the ip’s just compile, and then upload the client and send the link to your friend. Remember you both have to code the same source on the same computer (use teamviewer, logmein, or remote desktop connection)

If you have any other errors, problems, or questions feel free to pm me

~Andrew

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a 317 online (IMPORTANT READ)
